data.title: Casual Casino Games: Simple, Feel-Good Fun!
data.description:
The Best Casual Casino Games For Crypto Players

Looking to keep it casual? Take a break from slots, roulette, and blackjack – and play fun casual casino games.

In our library you’ll find everything from crash games to Plinko, bingo to scratch cards. They’re all easy-to-play games and crypto-friendly. 

It’s a bet fast, win fast situation. The best kind of play!

✨What are “Casual Casino Games” Exactly?

Casino games that are super easy to play are classified as “Casual games.”Games like bingo, or Plinko don’t have complex rules like other classic casino games or game shows. So, you can get right in on the action. 

Casual games aren't just for new casino players either — seasoned players love them too as you can rack up some serious wins, fast.

Why Play Casual Games?

  1. Anyone can play: The rules are a breeze, so you can jump in and play straight away with no steep learning curve.

  2. No complicated rules: Forget about crazy bonus features and complicated side bets. Casual games don't require a lot of decision-making. Just play to win.

  3. Low starting bets: Casual games are perfect for low-stakes players or anyone looking for some fun. Most easy casino games accept bets as low as $0.01.

Types of Casual Crypto Games to Get You Started

At CoinCasino we've got every type of casual game you can imagine. These are the best to keep you entertained:

Crash Games

Crash games are the epitome of casual games. Watch multipliers build and try to cash out before it crashes. Timing is everything with this interactive experience.

If you’re thinking you’ve heard the name before, it’s because Crash games made a name for themselves with streamers on platforms like YouTube, and Twitch. 

How to play crash games:

  1. Decide on your initial bet.

  2. Begin the game and watch the multiplier rise.

  3. Cash out your winnings before it crashes.

  4. Repeat!

Plinko Casual Game

Plinko is all about the thrills. It’s random, fun, and can be seriously rewarding. Drop a small ball or balls at the top of the Plinko board and watch it bounce down the peg-filled board. The bottom buckets carry different multipliers. So keep your eyes peeled.

How to play Plinko:

  1. Decide on your stake.

  2. Choose a spot at the top of the board to drop the ball.

  3. Watch the ball trickle down until it stops in a pocket.

  4. Every pocket has a multiplier which ranges from 0.2x to 1,000x.

Mines Games

The goal of Mines games is to avoid the mines! It’s that simple. Hit as many safe spots as possible, and cash out big. 

If you've played Minesweeper before, you know how it is. High-risk, high-reward, and all about that adrenaline-pumping action.

How to play mines games:

  1. Select the initial bet size.

  2. Decide how many mines will be present

  3. Choose a tile and click. A gem will appear if the tile is safe.

  4. Keep clicking on tiles to reveal either gems or mines.

  5. The game ends when you hit a mine or you decide to cash out. 

  6. Your payout depends on how many gems you got before cashing out, and the number of mines that were part of the game.

Instant Win Games

Instant games offer instant results. So, there’s no need to wait around for a dealer to dish out the cards or for the slot’s reels to stop spinning. 

Scratch cards are the most popular instant win game. Just scratch to reveal the hidden symbols or numbers to see what lies beneath the hidden areas. Other options that will get your pulse racing include Keno and dice games.

How to play instant win games (scratchcards):

  1. Decide on the amount you want to bet.

  2. Hit the "Scratch" button to start.

  3. The hidden symbols or numbers will appear in front of your eyes.

  4. Win when you match specific numbers or symbols.

Bingo Games

Casual bingo online is basically a classic game of bingo, but faster and with instant gratification. 

You can find easy-to-play variants or bingo games that are a bit more complex. So, it’s all down to what you’re in the mood for.

How to play bingo:

  1. Buy your ticket(s).

  2. Random numbers will be drawn. 

  3. Your card will be marked when a number matches the one called.

  4. Win by matching lines to make specific card patterns.

All Casual Games

Can't pick just one type of casino game? Our casual casino games selection means you can explore your options. You’ll find additional titles such as Keno, video poker and dice games.

Most games have a demo mode. You can test the waters with free demos of casino casual games before playing with real money.

Why Play Casual Games With Crypto?

Players choose to play crypto casual games to benefit from speedy payments, privacy, and exclusive bonuses.

Whether you're choosing Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin, or any one of the 10+ cryptocurrencies available, you’ll get to enjoy these significant benefits:

  • Privacy: No need to share any sensitive information. Just copy and paste your wallet address. You're all set!

  • Speed: We offer instant payouts. Other online casinos can take hours, days, or even weeks to process payments. We don't delay or stall, so you get your crypto winnings fast.

  • Exclusive Bonuses: Crypto users often get access to exclusive bonuses that fiat users can't imagine.

  • Global Access: No matter where you are, you can always use crypto. So, if your local currency is not supported, you can still play! 

🎁Casino Offers for Casual Players

Who doesn't like a good bonus? At CoinCasino, we're always trying to give back to our players. Keep an eye out for any of these offers before you play casual games to get more for your money:

  • Welcome Bonus: If you’re new here, you can score a 200% first deposit bonus up to $30,000 and 50 free spins when you sign up. No bonus code is needed — deposit, and play.

  • Reload Bonuses: We often match existing customers' deposits to give them free spins and/or bonus money. It’s an extra boost to fund your play!

  • Cashback: Lose while playing your favorite casino games? No sweat — we'll refund a percentage of your losses when you opt in for a cashback bonus.

  • Tournaments: Enter tournaments with game-changing prize pools. Compete to see if you can reach the top spot on the leaderboard and win big.

How to Get The Most From Casual Crypto Games

Casual games are all about having fun. They're simple, with stunning graphics and easy gameplay. Here are a few tips to keep in mind when playing to level up your play:

  1. Set a Budget: We always recommend setting a budget when playing even the simplest casino games. You'll know when to stop and won't be tempted to chase losses.

  2. Try New Games: Many users miss out by playing the same game repeatedly. We've got dozens of instant win options at CoinCasino, so you'll want to explore. You could uncover some hidden gems in our casino games collection.

  3. Claim Those Bonuses: Remember to regularly visit our promotions page to see what you can claim. Snagging great bonuses to play casual games is a win-win situation.

Keep it Casual – Join CoinCasino & Play!
